user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, reliable underwear that would keep me feeling good throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I chose this product primarily for its comfort and reliability. The breathable cotton and cooling features were appealing, as I wanted something that would keep me comfortable throughout the day. The positive reputation of the brand also played a significant role in my decision, as I trust Hanes for quality underwear.

My decision to purchase this item was influenced by the comfort it promised, particularly the soft cotton material and moisture-wicking properties. I was looking for something that would provide all-day comfort without irritation, and the brand's established reputation for quality reinforced my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, soft, and true to size. I value versatility in clothing and footwear, as well as features that enhance comfort, such as cushioning and breathable materials. I appreciate items that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer a good fit and are aesthetically pleasing, whether through color, design, or style. On the other hand, I dislike products made from hard or uncomfortable materials, as well as those that do not meet my expectations for softness or comfort. I also find poor fit or sizing issues unappealing, as they detract from the overall experience.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Men's Premium Tag-Free Cotton Underwear (Regular & Big Man)> / Item ID: B09ZVRTGF7 / Price: $16.02 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['The Fruit of the Loom Premium Collection will take your favorite everyday underwear and undershirts to the next level. Made with Premium Eversoft ring spun cotton that provides premium softness wash after wash. We are proud of the hard work we put into the fit of each product, which is why we back every purchase with our Best Fit Guarantee.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <ORGATICS Men's Boxer Briefs Long -%92 Cotton &%8 Lycra> / Item ID: B07L722Q8J / Price: $7.9 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['Composition 92 % combed cotton / 8% Lycra Combed single jersey cotton. The cotton fibers are combed before being spun into yarns, to avoid short fibers and unwanted particles. This makes the fabric incredibly soft, with high durability.8% DuPont Lycra added, to give reliable and flexible hold, and maintain top fabric breathability.*Size Guide (Waist in Inches):*X-Small (US): 28-30Small (US): 30-32Medium (US): 32-34Large (US): 34-36X-Large (US) : 36-38XX-Large (US): 38-40*Fabrics:* 92% Cotton 8% Lycra Combed single jersey cotton, appr. 200 grams per square meter.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Men's Recycled Waffle Thermal Underwear Crew Top (1 and 2 Packs)> / Item ID: B08D322MJQ / Price: $16.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Thermal Underwear'] / Description: ['Whether you’re looking for foundational warmth, lightweight performance, or both, this Fruit of the Loom Premium Men’s Thermal Crew-neck Top certainly has you covered. Made from U.S. sourced cotton and recycled polyester, this men’s base layer has a bulk-free fitted style and is built for protection, performance, and utmost comfort when you’re active outdoors in cold to moderately cold conditions. The natural breathability of cotton offers moisture-wicking to keep you dry, and the natural stretch offers flexible comfort that does not restrict your movements. The fabric’s waffle weaves create small air pockets that hold heat next to the body, and the rib cuffs at the wrists ensure heat stays trapped as much as possible. Additional features like a tag-free neck label and flat seams prevent chafing and enhances overall comfort. This Fruit of the Loom Premium Men’s Thermal Crew-neck Top is a must-have essential for your winter wardrobe.']

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Tagless White Briefs with ComfortFlex Waistband-Multiple Packs Available> / Item ID: B09J23VG1K / Price: $7.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Briefs'] / Description: ["When it's time to stock up on basic white briefs, Hanes® has the ones you want. These soft, cotton-blend men's briefs are knit from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. You'll really appreciate the ComfortFlex® waistband that moves with you and keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or binding. These ultra comfortable, full-cut, cotton-blend briefs are also tagless so there's no annoying tag to bunch up or itch. With a traditional open fly, this cool, breathable underwear comes in a convenient 6-pack of all white so stocking up is a no-brainer."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Underwear Boxer Briefs Pack, Moisture-Wicking Men's Mesh Underwear, X-Temp Cooling with Odor Control, 3-Pack> / Item ID: B07JDRLQZ8 / Price: $15.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from a high-quality X-Temp™ 4-way stretch mesh fabric that's designed to adapt to your body temperature. So as your body sweats, the smart technology wicks away moisture and reduces odor to keep you feeling comfortable all day long. Our experts also designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that helps your men's underwear flex and move with you. And their no-ride-up design stays securely in place, so you don't have to keep adjusting throughout the day. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's boxer underwear sets are available in multiple size options that won't ride up, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Men's 5pk Beyondsoft Boxer Brief> / Item ID: B071NJDDTW / Price: $16.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["Looking for your next go-to pair of underwear Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer briefs, 5-pack offer the comfort and style of a boxer combined with the support of a brief. Beyond soft is made of durable fabric that shrinks less than 100 percent cotton. Plus, beyond soft naturally wicks moisture away, keeping you feeling dry all day. The traditional fly provides support and the soft waistband will keep you comfortable in every situation. The Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer brief, 5-pack offers our legs don't ride up feature ensuring the legs stay in place all day. Each Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer brief is designed tag free for all day comfort and shrinks less wash after wash."]
